thread.title: Chase Bank hiring for 300 jobs at career fair in Tempe
thread.title_full: Chase Bank hiring for 300 jobs at career fair in Tempe

author: Logan Newman , The Republic | azcentral.com
title: Chase Bank hiring for 300 jobs at career fair in Tempe
text:
Chase Bank is hosting a career fair Feb. 1, 2017 to hire up to 300 positions in its Tempe call center. (Photo: The Republic) 
Are you looking for a job opportunity in banking?
Chase Bank is hosting a career fair from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Wednesday in Tempe to fill up to 300 positions. The openings are in the customer service and collections center, primarily revolving around the call center. Employees will assist in fields including the help desk, fraud prevention and new client services.
The job description on Chase’s website says employees “must be willing to work in an environment that requires 100 percent phone-based customer interaction.”
The bank is encouraging applicants who have experience in customer service fields, though previous call center work is not mandatory. Chase is also seeking bilingual applicants.
The fair will be held at the Chase Centerpoint Operations Center, 100 W. University Drive, Tempe. Parking is available in the garage at 720 S. Ash Ave.
For more information, visit chase.com/careers , go to the “search jobs” bar on the top right corner and enter job number 160128541.
